resources.string:
Failed to connect to Pinup Popper.

Please ensure Pinup is currently running on your cab and try again.

If you have changed the IP or name of your machine, then alter the URL below and reconnect.
Failed to connect to Popper, ensure your cabinet is on and popper is running before trying again...
If you are having problems ensure you have followed all the setup steps.\n\nhttp://www.nailbuster.com/wikipinup/doku.php?id=web_remote_control
